Pasar Malam OUG
Pasar Malam Lembah Subang
Enjoy your Stay :)
Welcome to Pasar Malam Cari Makan!
pasar_layout1

This is the front main street view of Pasar Lembah Subang.

The stalls continue onwards and then shifts to the left.
There is alot of food choices available ranging from Malay to Chinese food.

Ayam grilled with Madu(honey) that taste fabulous with rice. 

Ayam Madu KALLOLO special:
1 ketul = RM 1.50
3 ketul = RM 5.00
6 ketul = RM 10.00

Specially made Samosa, Karipaps and Popiah Goreng that taste fabulous alongside their homemade Sambal Kicap.

Samosa,Popiah and Karipap:
3 ketul = RM 3.00
6 ketul = RM 6.00
12 ketul = RM 9.00

Hand-Made Roti John that contain a variety of ingredients to enhance the underlying taste

Roti John Hand-Made:
Roti John Ayam = RM 5.50
Roti John aging = RM 5.50
Roti John Cheezy = RM 7.00
Roti John Special= RM10.00

A convinient Juice Stand that sells Mango and Sugercane juice.

Per Bungkus:
1 Bungkus = RM 3.00
2 Bungkus = RM 7.00
3 Bungkus = RM 10.00

Home-Made Putu Bambu that comes in its signature white coating of coconut shaving.

Per Packet:
1 packet = RM 4.50

Freshly made Bakar Ayam, Kerang and Ikan that is wrapped in a tinfoil.

Ayam,Kerang and Ikan:
Ayam Bakar=RM 5.00
Ikan Bakar=RM 7.00
Kerang Bakar=RM 7.00

Apam Balik Special Version China Edition
1 Piece=RM 0.60
3 Piece=RM 1.70
6 Pieces=RM 2.20
Delicious Chee Chong Fang Sold:\n1 Chee Chong Fang=RM 10:00\n

Delicious Assortment Of Snacks:
Prices of Snack are highly flexible and are dependent on the Vendor
Somedays its cheaper and Vice Versa.

Special Dimsum:1 Piece=RM 2.00
3 Piece=RM 3.50
6 Piece=RM 5.50

Wide Arrange of Movies ranging from Chinese to Malay type is sold here:
1 Movie=RM 5.00
3 Movies= Rm 14.00
6 Movies= RM 30.00

Handmade Laksa with a chinese twist:
1 Bowl=RM 6.00
2 Bowls=RM 11.00
3 Bowls=RM 15.00

Ayam Goreng Istimewa:Butter Chicken=RM 6.00
Chili Stirred Chicken=RM 5.00
Fried Chicken=RM 7.00
Salted Egg Chicken=RM 10.00
